settings.title: Settings
settings.headerSubtitle: Manage your website settings and preferences
settings.closedMessagePlaceholder: Enter a message to display when website is closed
settings.closedMessageHint: This message will be shown to users when the website is closed

settings.closeTimeHint: Time when the website will automatically close after opening

settings.importHint: Enter company names one per line, or as JSON array

settings.disabledByAutoSchedule: Disabled when automatic schedule is enabled
settings.manualDisabledHint: Manual control is disabled when automatic schedule is active
settings.postRegistrationNotificationDescription: Write a message that will be displayed to companies after they complete registration. This message will appear on the companies list page after successful registration.

settings.postRegistrationMessageHint: This message will be displayed prominently after companies complete their registration. Leave empty to show no notification.
settings.notePaymentRegistrationDescription: This note is shown to visitors (non-logged-in users) on mobile. They can view it by tapping the Notes button.
settings.notePaymentRegistrationPlaceholder: Enter notes or instructions for visitors (e.g., payment guidelines, contact info, hours of operation...)
settings.notePaymentRegistrationHint: Visible only to non-logged-in users on mobile. Leave empty to hide the Notes button.
